description: At this restaurant in the charming historic centre of Macerata, chef Michele Biagiola serves dishes inspired by rural culinary traditions, with herbs gathered in the fields nearby featuring in some of his recipes. Elaborate, gourmet cuisine is served at lunchtime, while the evening menu focuses on simpler, less expensive fare.
